text: The women's 4x400 metres relay event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 17 and 18 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Alexandria Anderson Ashlee Kidd Stephanie Smith Natasha Hastings ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Viktoriya Talko Mariya Shapayeva Olga Soldatova Yekaterina Kostetskaya ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Nyoka Cole Maris Wisdom Sherene Pinnock Sonita Sutherland ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 18 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Women's 4 × 400 metres relay
